body: How do I report you for noticing censorship?
body_html: How do I report you for noticing censorship?

guild.description:
Just videos of black people. Real footage that the media refuses to show and social media censors. Reddit,  and the rest of big tech regularly censor  videos that show "a POC as the aggressor". 

The goal of this Guild isn't hate porn or racism, but fighting back against censorship by showing the videos that nobody else will. 

- No pornography.

- Post whatever you want,  as long as it's a video of black people.

- Please don't editorialize headlines with your opinion,  let the video speak for itself. 

- please tag NSFW / NSFL appropriately.
guild.description_html:
Just videos of black people. Real footage that the media refuses to show and social media censors. Reddit, and the rest of big tech regularly censor videos that show "a POC as the aggressor".

The goal of this Guild isn't hate porn or racism, but fighting back against censorship by showing the videos that nobody else will.

  • No pornography.

  • Post whatever you want, as long as it's a video of black people.

  • Please don't editorialize headlines with your opinion, let the video speak for itself.

  • please tag NSFW / NSFL appropriately.
guild.name: VidsofBlacks

body: I know it's tough but give it the benefit of the doubt. Could be admins are fixing something they broke with the implementation of the cat system. Or since you post content of videos with peoples faces in it a dmca request or cease an disist was filed. I don't actually know american law that well.
body_html: I know it's tough but give it the benefit of the doubt. Could be admins are fixing something they broke with the implementation of the cat system. Or since you post content of videos with peoples faces in it a dmca request or cease an disist was filed. I don't actually know american law that well.
